title: Wire frame
para: We will require certain information about the website and our website designer will confirm the target audience, the key products and services, and the layout that you wish to consider.

title: web design
para: After a kickoff meeting, we will work on your website design and deliver the first cut of your website for your review. The first draft includes the color theme, your website user interface, icon selections, website layout, and responsiveness on different devices.

title: development
para: After reviewing the first draft we will get your feedback. If there are any revisions then we will get it done. These revisions include anything you wanted to change from icons to website layout. Revisions aren’t completed until you’re 100% satisfied.

title: final delivery
para: Upon revisions finalization and your approval, we will bring your website to live at your domain within 24 to 48 hours.
